22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Uqbah bin 'Amir: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: The atonement for a vow is the same as for an oath. Abu Dawud said: This tradition has also been transmitted by 'Amr b. al-Harith from Ka'b b. 'Alqamah, from Ibn Shamasah on the authority of 'Uqbah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ نَذَرَ نَذْرًا لَمْ يُسَمِّهِ
chapter.eng-name: On A Man Who Takes A Vow But Does Not Name it
